Typealiases.html#/s:16SudoEntitlements16.name: ClientCompletion
Typealiases.html#/s:16SudoEntitlements16.abstract: Generic type associated with API completion/closures. Generic type O is the expected output result in a success case.

Structs/UserEntitlements.html#/s:16SudoE.name: version
Structs/UserEntitlements.html#/s:16SudoE.abstract: Version number of the user’s entitlements. This is incremented every

Structs/UserEntitlements.html#/s:16SudoE.name: entitlementsSetName
Structs/UserEntitlements.html#/s:16SudoE.abstract: Name of the entitlement set assigned to the user or undefined if the user’s

Structs/UserEntitlements.html#/s:16SudoE.name: entitlements
Structs/UserEntitlements.html#/s:16SudoE.abstract: The full set of entitlements assigned to the user.

Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.name: name
Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.abstract: Name of the set of entitlements. This will often be a few words separated by dots like an internet domain.

Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.name: description
Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.abstract: Human readable description of the set of entitlements.

Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.name: version
Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.abstract: Version number of the user’s entitlements. This is incremented every

Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.name: created
Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.abstract: When the set of entitlements was created.

Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.name: updated
Structs/EntitlementsSet.html#/s:16SudoEn.abstract: When the set of entitlements was last updated.

Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.name: consumer
Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.abstract: Consumer of the entitlement. If present this indicates the sub-user level resource

Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.name: value
Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.abstract: The maximum amount of the entitlement that can be consumed by the consumer

Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.name: consumed
Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.abstract: The amount of the entitlement that has been consumed

Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.name: available
Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.abstract: The amount of the entitlement that is yet to be consumed. Provided for convenience.

Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.name: firstConsumedAtEpochMs
Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.abstract: Time at which this entitlement was first consumed

Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.name: lastConsumedAtEpochMs
Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html#/s:1.abstract: Time of the most recent consumption of this entitlement

Structs/EntitlementConsumer.html#/s:16Su.name: id
Structs/EntitlementConsumer.html#/s:16Su.abstract: ID of the resource consuming an entitlement

Structs/EntitlementConsumer.html#/s:16Su.name: issuer
Structs/EntitlementConsumer.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Issuer of the ID of the consumer. For example sudoplatform.sudoservice for a Sudo ID

Structs/Entitlement.html.name: Entitlement
Structs/Entitlement.html.abstract: A representation of a single entitlement possessed by a user.

Structs/EntitlementConsumer.html.name: EntitlementConsumer
Structs/EntitlementConsumer.html.abstract: A representation of the sub-user level consuming resource of an entitlement

Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html.name: EntitlementConsumption
Structs/EntitlementConsumption.html.abstract: A representation of the consumption of a particular entitlement

Structs/EntitlementsSet.html.name: EntitlementsSet
Structs/EntitlementsSet.html.abstract: A representation of a set of entitlements possessed by a user.

Structs/UserEntitlements.html.name: UserEntitlements
Structs/UserEntitlements.html.abstract: A representation of the entitlements of a user and how they are assigned

Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.name: getEntitlementsConsumption(completion:)
Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get the current set of entitlements and their consumption for the user

Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.name: getExternalId(completion:)
Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get the external ID as determined by the entitlements service.

Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.name: getEntitlements(completion:)
Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.abstract: Get the current set of entitlements for the user.

Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.name: consumeBooleanEntitlements(entitlementNames:completion:)
Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html#/s.abstract: Record consumption of a set of boolean entitlements.

Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html.name: SudoEntitlementsClient
Protocols/SudoEntitlementsClient.html.abstract: Client used to interface with the Sudo Entitlements Platform service.

Functions.html#/s:16SudoEntitlements09sp.name: splitUserEntitlementsVersion(version:)
Functions.html#/s:16SudoEntitlements09sp.abstract: Split a composite entitlements version in to its user entitlements version and entitlements set

Enums/CachePolicy.html#/s:16SudoEntitlem.abstract: Query and use the data on the server.

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: The configuration related to Entitlements Service is not found in the provided configuration file

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that the input to the API was invalid.

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: accountLocked
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates the requested operation failed because the user account is locked.

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: notAuthorized
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that the request operation failed due to authorization error. This maybe due to the authentication

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: limitExceeded
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates API call failed due to it exceeding some limits imposed for the API. For example, this error

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: insufficientEntitlements
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that the user does not have sufficient entitlements to perform the requested operation.

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: versionMismatch
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates the version of the vault that is getting updated does not match the current version of the vault stored

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: serviceError
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that an internal server error caused the operation to fail. The error is possibly transient and

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: requestFailed(response:cause:)
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that the request failed due to connectivity, availability or access error.

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: rateLimitExceeded
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that there were too many attempts at sending API requests within a short period of time.

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.name: graphQLError(description:)
Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that a GraphQL error was returned by the backend.

Enums/SudoEntitlementsError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that a fatal error occurred. This could be due to coding error, out-of-memory condition or other

Enums/CachePolicy.html.abstract: Cache policy that determines how data is accessed when performing a query method from
